text: mariyu (jnapakam cesukondi)! Musa tana prajalaku niti koraku prarthinci nappudu, memu: "Nivu a bandanu ni karrato kottu!" Ani adesincamu. Appudu dani nundi pannendu utalu pravahincasagayi. Prati tegavaru tama niru trage sthalanni kanugonnaru. (Appudu varito annamu): "Allah miku prasadincina aharanni tinandi tragandi kani, bhumilo kallolam reputu daurjan'yaparuluga tiragakandi
